meanings.sent1: The man looked unshaven with his scruffy beard.
meanings.sent2: She preferred his unshaven look, finding it rugged and attractive.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was going for the unshaven, 'mountain man' style.
meanings.sent4: The unshaven appearance gave him a mysterious air.
meanings.sent5: The unshaven face stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: Having facial hair that has not been removed by shaving.
meanings.sent1: Her uncle's unshaven cheeks tickled when he kissed her.
meanings.sent2: The actor sported an unshaven look for his new role.
meanings.sent3: The unshaven look made him resemble a wise wizard.
meanings.sent4: The unshaven chin added character to his face.
meanings.sent5: The unshaven jawline gave him a rugged charm.
